item.title: How to make my command
item.dc:creator: @madfrk223 madfrk223
item.description:
@madfrk223 wrote:

hey guys please help me i made a command with a command generator and i don’t know where to put the code here is the code.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“xrichie”)&& playerRights >= 2){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“xrichie”)){ //Voule Command Generator
addItem(0995,999999999);
sendMessage(“u r now rich! :)”);
sendMessage(“You have left to spend”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" is now rich! :)";
}
